title: Postselected Temporal Search: Energy, Bits, Length
abstract: Explores constraints linking energy cost, description length, and bit-complexity for postselected temporal search protocols.

title: Holonomy Recursion and Code Catalysis: Foundations
abstract: Outlines a holonomy-based recursion and catalytic coding framework and states foundational invariants and conditions.

title: Boundary-Encoded Postselection for Reality Editing
abstract: Introduces boundary-encoded postselection mechanisms for controlled state selection and reality-editing protocols; sketches operational architecture.
